holidays.title: National Olive Day
holidays.description: The olive has its roots in a traditional Mediterranean diet, but it’s enjoyed worldwide these days.

holidays.title: Dare Day
holidays.description: Are you a daredevil? If yes, you will enjoy this day more than anyone else!

holidays.title: Dinosaur Day
holidays.description: Let’s travel back to prehistoric times to meet the great and amazing dinosaurs.

holidays.title: Don't Give up the Ship Day
holidays.description: This battle is recorded as one of the deadliest in British-American naval history.

holidays.title: Flip A Coin Day
holidays.description: Today, be like Julius Caesar and flip a coin for every difficult decision in your life!

holidays.title: Gawai Dayak
holidays.description: Get into the festive spirit as we celebrate the festival of the Dayak people.

holidays.title: Intergenerational Day
holidays.description: Let’s build connections with each other by sharing old experiences and new adventures.

holidays.title: International Children's Day
holidays.description: Let’s vow to give every child their rights on this important day!

holidays.title: International Tabletop Day
holidays.description: We’re excited to go all-in for our favorite games!

holidays.title: Madaraka Day
holidays.description: The first step is sometimes as valuable as any other. Come celebrate Madaraka Day with us!

holidays.title: National Barefoot Day
holidays.description: Today, it’s time to put our best foot forward and contribute to a charitable cause.

holidays.title: National Billboard Day
holidays.description: The simple concept behind National Billboard day has been around for ages.

holidays.title: National Black Bear Day
holidays.description: We've got all the information you need about America's black bear right here.

holidays.title: National Bubbly Day
holidays.description: Let your enthusiasm bubble over; celebrate National Bubbly Day our way!

holidays.title: National Hazelnut Cake Day
holidays.description: Hazelnut cakes are one of the most popular cakes in America.

holidays.title: National Heimlich Maneuver Day
holidays.description: This day recognizes this important and life-saving technique of the Heimlich maneuver.

holidays.title: National Nail Polish Day
holidays.description: Instead of painting the town red, paint your nails with any color you want!

holidays.title: National Pen Pal Day
holidays.description: The rich tradition of making pen pals continues even today despite social media.

holidays.title: National Prairie Day
holidays.description: National Prairie Day promotes the appreciation and conservation of America's native prairies.

holidays.title: National Roman Day
holidays.description: Let’s pull out all the stops for the Romans in the world today.

holidays.title: National Skincare Education Day
holidays.description: This National Skincare Education Day, learn why taking good care of your skin is critical.

holidays.title: National Trails Day
holidays.description: National Trails Day is not a trial but an awesome celebration of hiking!

holidays.title: New Year's Resolution Recommitment Day
holidays.description: Given up on your New Year’s resolutions? Nurture the spark of change and begin again.

holidays.title: Oscar the Grouch Day
holidays.description: Today we celebrate Oscar the Grouch, the grumpy fictional character on “Sesame Street”.

holidays.title: Samoa Independence Day
holidays.description: After 60 years of independence, Samoa maintains a strong and multifaceted relationship with New Zealand.

holidays.title: Say Something Nice Day
holidays.description: People may not remember what you do, but they’ll certainly remember how you made them feel.

holidays.title: Stand For Children Day
holidays.description: Special days like these can make the country better for the children of America.

holidays.title: Statehood Day in Kentucky
holidays.description: Celebrate Statehood Day by wearing red, white, and blue and waving your Kentucky flag!

holidays.title: Statehood Day in Tennessee
holidays.description: Bust out your red, white, and blue outfit and flag to celebrate Statehood Day of Tennessee!

holidays.title: The Big Lunch
holidays.description: Get ready to meet and make new friends, it's The Big Lunch.

holidays.title: Wear a Dress Day
holidays.description: On Wear a Dress Day, you have got to dress to impress — and we know just how!

holidays.title: World Milk Day
holidays.description: From a glass of milk, to a heaping bowl of ice cream, we celebrate it all!

holidays.title: World Narcissistic Abuse Awareness Day
holidays.description: On this day, let us take heed of the warning signs that constitute narcissistic abuse.

holidays.title: World Outlander Day
holidays.description: Join us as we celebrate the long-running historical drama, “Outlander,” this June 1!

holidays.title: World Reef Awareness Day
holidays.description: Reefs create a magical marine world. Let’s explore this world on World Reef Awareness Day.

holidays.title: Chase Chrisley’s Birthday
holidays.description: Today, we are celebrating Chase Chrisley, the man who loves his family dearly.

holidays.title: Juliet Rader’s Birthday
holidays.description: This sweet little YouTuber has a life’s worth of memories yet to be documented.

holidays.title: Marilyn Monroe’s Birthday
holidays.description: This Hollywood legend revolutionized the industry by walking so that present and future actors can fly.

holidays.title: Morgan Freeman’s Birthday
holidays.description: You're going to want to learn more about the impressive life of this amazing actor.

holidays.title: Notch’s Birthday
holidays.description: This video game designer and billionaire has no feat left to achieve.

holidays.title: Tom Holland’s Birthday
holidays.description: Our spidey senses think you will enjoy learning more about this talented actor.
